name: Bl. John Tauler

locations.description: German Dominican mystic and preacher, one of the great Rhineland mystics

summary: John Tauler was a German Dominican friar, mystic, and preacher who was one of the great Rhineland mystics. His sermons, which emphasized the inner spiritual life and union with God, were highly influential. He was a disciple of Meister Eckhart and influenced later mystics including Martin Luther and the Protestant Reformation.
